entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML bindings are flagging invalid binding failures - it is confused as to what the data context is... #8433
  • Add MtouchLink command to support XAML Hot Reload for iOS Devices #8429
    6.0-sr3
  • Scrollview control not working properly in .Net MAUI (Android) #8427
  • IconFont not working #8426
  • iOS SearchBar "Cancel" button gets rendered inconsistently #8425
    6.0-servicing
  • CollectionView item gets added with unassigned data #8424
    6.0-servicing
  • Items are stuck to the CollectionView when there is ItemSpacing #8422
  • ApplicationData.Current support for Windows Unpackaged #8419
    6.0-sr3
  • CollectionView does not select an element with a Frame as DataTemplate #8416
  • Very stange problem: XAML refuses to update #8415
  • Programmatically way to Bootstrap Windows Platform in pure C# #8413
  • CollectionView renders entries of same dimensions incorrectly when using MeasureFirstItem mode #8412
  • What is best way to measure startup? #8411
  • Problem with refreshing UI, Android #8406
  • UI rendering not working as expected on Android #8405
  • What does the IconImageSource property of ContentPage do? #8404
  • Application.Current.MainPage is null on application launch in windows #8403
  • Design differences between Android and iOS #8402

Closed

  • > are not fired on Windows platform #8431
  • `Border` with `CornerRadius` doesn't clip its content #8381
  • MAUI won't build with Preview 17.3 #8360
  • IJSRuntime and window.print() break MAUI Blazor App #7880
    .NET 7
  • ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback not being called in MAUI Single Project #8417
  • Label is positioned incorrectly #7684
    6.0-servicing
  • Dynamically changing view in ContentView content shows empty page (Android) #8040
    6.0-sr3
  • [Bug] Add items to the Grid after rendering the page. #8025
    6.0-sr3
  • What is best way to measure startup? #8410
  • Control Frame used in a ControlTemplate doesn't work on Windows #6467
    6.0-servicing
  • maui publish windows 32bit #8196

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the WASDK self-contained by default #8432
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix Editor on iOS so it can GC #8430
  • [Windows] Add a root view for a window to manage pages and overlays #8428
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, area/tooling ⚙️, 6.0-sr3
  • Add LinkMode command to support XAML Hot Reload for iOS Devices #8423
    partner/ui-tools, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr3
  • Update with branch information #8420
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Handle null/empty PropertyName in the INPC.PropertyChanged event #8418
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix wrong RadialGradient on Border #8408
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix crash on Picker with null ItemDisplayBinding #8407
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-picker, 6.0-sr3

Merged

  • Return unknown if not on UI Thread for WinUI #8368
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Remove the workaround for the WinUI targets #8397
    area/single project ☝️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update with branch and project structure #8396
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Convert Android Hit Test values to Units #8399
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools

Updated

  • [android] fix MauiSplashScreen on Android 12+ #8394
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • Remove the confusing `.` in the template tests #8392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SelfContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1.1 #7858
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Handler allocation tests #8177
